name: MR VIJAY KUMAR

image.altText: Vijay Kumar Founder and CEO of The Vijay Bharat Trading and services PVT LTD

bio: Mr. Vijay Kumar, founder of Vijay Bharat Trading and Services. With 7+ years of experience in the jewellery industry and a passion for e-commerce, Help businesses grow through custom solutions. Focused on innovation and quality, I aim to provide best and affordable services worldwide.
